address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x18`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

bits_per_sample.docs:
**, enum**: The bit depth of the audio samples. One of `16bit`, `24bit`, or `32bit`. Defaults to `16bit`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
The ID of the [I²C bus](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) the ES8311 is connected to.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

mic_gain.docs:
**, enum**: The gain applied to the ADC microphones. One of `MIN`, `0DB`, `6DB`, `12DB`, `18DB`, `24DB`, `30DB`, `36DB`, `42DB`, or `MAX`. Defaults to `42DB`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

sample_rate.docs:
**, positive integer**: I2S sample rate. Defaults to `16000`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

use_mclk.docs:
**, bool**: Use the MCLK signal to control the clock. Defaults to `True`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*

use_microphone.docs:
**, bool**: Configure the codec’s ADC for microphone input. Defaults to `False`.

*See also: [ES8311](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8311.html#configuration-variables)*
